column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Yesterday my sons and I received an invitation from their grandmother in Reno to come for a visit .
#id=2
#text=I do n't really like to fly on an airplane and I thought taking a train would be a great way for my young sons to see the country .
#id=3
#text=So we went to the train station and bought train tickets .
#id=4
#text=Then we went home and packed our suitcases for the journey .
#id=5
#text=The next day we went to the train station an hour early from the departure time .
#id=6
#text=We gave our tickets to the station attendant and went outside to the platform to wait for our train .
#id=7
#text=The train pulled in just as we got out side .
#id=8
#text=My sons were very excited to be going across the country by train .
#id=9
#text=Then after the train had stopped , we go on board .
#text=The train went across the country and the landscape was beautiful !
#text=Three days later we arrived in Reno and were met by their grandmother at the train station .
